title: How many books are there in 1st year of MBBS? - Quora
tags: Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery Degrees

response.answer_text: Anatomy: 4 gross anatomy books Head and neck Neuroanatomy Upper limb and thorax Lower limb and abdomen 1.histology book 1.embryology book Biochemistry : single book Physiology : foreign author one book Indian author 2 books
